property.name: userLevelDocumentation
property.configure: This is a parameter with type integer with a limited range. Its value is an integer token that is constrained to lie within the boundaries specified by its two parameters, min and max. These specify the minimum and maximum values. A user interface will typically use this information to represent the parameter value using a slider. The default values for min and max are 0 and 100, respectively, and the default value for this parameter is 50.

property.name: prop:max
property.configure: The maximum value. This is has an integer value, and defaults to 100.

property.name: prop:min
property.configure: The minimum value. This is has an integer value, and defaults to 0.
